title: Parts Overview
content: This machine will require 3 or 4 sensors.
Each sensor comes with a 316 SS threaded ¼”-28 stud for screwing the sensor into a threaded hole on the machine surface.
Sensors require mounting surfaces of the machine to have wall thickness of ½” or greater for threaded studs.

title: Step 1 - Threaded Stud - Select the Spot for the Sensor

content.subtitle: Sensor Location and Orientation
text: Sensors should be mounted either horizontally or vertically at 3, 6, 9, or 12 o’clock.
The axis of the sensor should align with the machine’s shaft axis.
If you can’t mount the sensor to this orientation, please consult our guide on alternatives.

content.subtitle: Dealing with Shrouds and Guards
text: Use a hole saw so the sensor can protrude out of the guard.
Modify the shroud to mount NDE sensors.
Use a cutting wheel to modify guards easily.
Do not mount sensors directly on fan shrouds.
Do not fully encase sensor in guard or shroud.
